content: our latest creation is the the enterprise s captain and star of star trek the next generation jean-luc picard finished size approximately 28 cm 11 inches tall using 3 mm hook approximately 20 cm 8 inches tall using 2 75 mm hook materials yarn 8 ply/dk or appropriate in flesh black red light grey white and yellow crochet hook 3 mm or 2 75 mm or appropriate safety eyes optional can be embroidered instead stuffing you can use any yarn and crochet hook combination that gives you good gauge normally this would be a hook around two sizes smaller than that recommended on the yarn label for captain picard i used a 2 75 mm hook with 8ply/dk acrylic yarn the pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology
